name: Healthyfied Beef Bellpepper Bolognaise
description: This Healthyfied Beef Bellpepper Bolognaise brings a high-protein and low-carb delight to your table, perfect for health enthusiasts looking for low-sugar yet flavorful options. Each bite is an infusion of healthy and healthified ingredients designed to nourish your body and tantalize your taste buds with a blend of fresh herbs and robust flavors.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the bell pepper under cold water, then dice it into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the diced bell pepper to the skillet and saut√© for about 5 minutes until slightly softened.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Increase the heat to medium-high and add the beef to the skillet. Cook for about 10 minutes, breaking it apart with a spatula until browned.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Season the beef and bell pepper mixture with salt, white pepper, thyme, basil, marjoram, and black pepper. Stir well to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in the water and add the bolognese sauce to the skillet. Stir to combine and bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to low and let it simmer for about 20 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust seasoning as needed. Serve hot.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
